description: Details required for Condition 3 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 22/00158/PAMA (Change of use of first and second floors from Offices (Class E(g)(i)) to 5 no.x Residential Units (Class C3))On behalf of our client, please find attached documents for the full discharge of condition 3 bicycle parking of planning permission 22/00158/PAMAAccompanying this submission are the relevant application form, plan of location and images of the cycle parking, and information relating to the following:??Condition 3. Prior to beneficial occupation of the development, details of secure cycle parking facilities to serve the development to which this permission relates shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The cycle parking facilities as shown in the approved details shall be provided prior to beneficial occupation of the development to which this permission relates and shall be permanently retained for that purpose and kept free from obstruction thereafter. Reason: To ensure that appropriate opportunities to promote sustainable transport are taken up, in accordance with policy T5 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012??
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
